dsOverview.title: Various Daily 2.5-degree Tropospheric Analysis Time Series in GRIB Format, 1946-1999

summary.p: This dataset contains various tropospheric analysis time series' created from the grids of other DSS datasets and converted to GRIB (for grids that were not already in this format).
Currently, the only available time series' are series' of 500mb geopotential height.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
